Package index

Graphical functions

Core graphical functions

gMCP()
Graph based Multiple Comparison Procedures
graphMCP-class graphMCP print,graphMCP-method plot,graphMCP,ANY-method plot,graphMCP-method getWeights getWeights,graphMCP-method getMatrix getMatrix,graphMCP-method setWeights setWeights,graphMCP-method setRejected<- setRejected<-,graphMCP-method getRejected getRejected,graphMCP-method getXCoordinates getXCoordinates,graphMCP-method getYCoordinates getYCoordinates,graphMCP-method setEdge setEdge,character,character,graphMCP,character-method setEdge,character,character,graphMCP,numeric-method getNodes getNodes,graphMCP-method edgeAttr edgeAttr<- edgeAttr,graphMCP,character,character,character-method edgeAttr<-,graphMCP,character,character,character-method nodeAttr nodeAttr<- nodeAttr,graphMCP,character,character-method nodeAttr<-,graphMCP,character,character-method
Class graphMCP
gMCPResult-class gMCPResult print,gMCPResult-method plot,gMCPResult,ANY-method plot,gMCPResult-method getWeights,gMCPResult-method getRejected,gMCPResult-method
Class gMCPResult
hGraph()
Create multiplicity graphs using ggplot2
matrix2graph() graph2matrix()
Matrix2Graph and Graph2Matrix
placeNodes()
Placement of graph nodes
rejectNode()
Rejects a node/hypothesis and updates the graph accordingly.

Testing procedures

bonferroni.test()
Weighted Bonferroni-test
bonferroni.trimmed.simes.test()
Trimmed Simes test for intersections of two hypotheses and otherwise weighted Bonferroni-test
simes.test()
Weighted Simes test
simes.on.subsets.test()
Simes on subsets, otherwise Bonferroni
parametric.test()
Weighted parametric test
weighted.test.functions
Weighted Test Functions for use with gMCP

Confidence interval

simConfint()
Simultaneous confidence intervals for sequentially rejective multiple test procedures

Utility functions

Graphical-related

substituteEps()
Substitute Epsilon

Replaces variables in a general graph with specified numeric values

Create a Block Diagonal Matrix with NA outside the diagonal
